title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
Junior Software Engineer

About the Role

We're looking for a Junior Software Engineer to join our team and contribute to an exciting project that combines modern web technologies with 3D visualization and e-commerce capabilities.

Technical Stack

You'll be working with:

  • Frontend + Serverless backend: React Remix framework deployed on Vercel serverless infrastructure
  • Backend Services: AWS Lambda functions, DynamoDB for database operations, S3 for storage, and CloudFront for content delivery
  • Languages: Mix of TypeScript and JavaScript
  • 3D Rendering: BabylonJS for creating interactive 3D experiences
  • E-commerce: Shopify backend integration

What We're Looking For

We're seeking someone who is eager to learn and grow with our technology stack. If you have relevant experience with any of these technologies, that's great â€“ but we're equally interested in candidates who demonstrate strong foundational programming skills and enthusiasm for learning.

Key Qualifications:

  • Basic understanding of modern JavaScript/TypeScript and web development principles
  • Familiarity with React or similar component-based frameworks
  • Understanding of REST APIs and asynchronous programming
  • Ability to read documentation and learn new technologies independently
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively

Bonus Points For:

  • Experience with any part of our tech stack (Remix, AWS services, BabylonJS, Shopify APIs)
  • Understanding of serverless architecture concepts
  • Exposure to 3D graphics or WebGL
  • Previous work with e-commerce platforms or payment systems
  • Contributions to open-source projects or personal projects you can share

What You'll Do

  • Develop and maintain features across our full-stack application
  • Work with 3D visualizations and interactive user experiences
  • Integrate e-commerce functionality with our Shopify backend
  • Collaborate with senior engineers to implement best practices
  • Write clean, maintainable code with appropriate documentation
  • Participate in code reviews and team knowledge-sharing

What We Offer

  • Mentorship from experienced engineers
  • Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies
  • Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure and modern development practices
  • Collaborative team environment focused on growth and learning

We believe in investing in talent and providing the support needed to succeed. If you're passionate about software development and excited about this technology stack, we'd love to hear from you.
